We also have $LIBRARY_PATH set to the current loaded environment paths for our librairies, like cuDNN. Would you consider checking this variable automatically? It is used by gcc for example, and also autotools IIRC.

https://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/Environment-Variables.html#Environment-Variables
